title: AlignTrue Config v1
description: Configuration schema for AlignTrue CLI (solo/team/enterprise modes)

mode.description: Operating mode: solo (default, no lockfile), team (lockfile+bundle), enterprise (all features)

lockfile.description: Enable lockfile generation for reproducibility (auto-enabled in team mode)

bundle.description: Enable bundle generation for multi-source merging (auto-enabled in team mode)

mcp.description: Enable MCP server for editor integration (implemented)

mode.description: Lockfile validation mode: off (no validation), soft (warn on mismatch), strict (error on mismatch)
Git integration mode: ignore (no tracking), commit (auto-commit), branch (dedicated branch)

per_adapter.description: Override git mode per exporter adapter

branch_check_interval.description: Interval in seconds to check branches for updates (default: 86400 = 24 hours)

tag_check_interval.description: Interval in seconds to check tags for updates (default: 604800 = 7 days)

offline_fallback.description: Use cache if network unavailable (default: true)

auto_gitignore.description: Automatically manage .gitignore: auto (based on git.mode), always, never (default: auto)

watch_enabled.description: Enable watch mode for auto-sync on file changes (default: false)

watch_debounce.description: Debounce delay in milliseconds for watch mode (default: 500)

watch_files.description: File patterns to watch for changes (default: .aligntrue/rules/**/*.md)

source_order.description: Custom ordering of rule files by basename (default: alphabetical). Example: ['architecture.md', 'security.md', 'coding.md']

source_markers.description: Control source file markers in concatenated outputs. auto: show only with multiple sources (default), always: always show, never: never show

auto_manage_ignore_files.description: Automatically manage agent ignore files to prevent duplicate context. true: always manage, false: never manage, prompt: ask user (default: prompt)

cleanup.description: Cleanup mode when switching export formats. all: remove all files matching agent patterns (default), managed: only remove files previously created by AlignTrue

files.description: Full file paths to protect from direct edits

sections.description: Section headings to protect from direct edits

sources.description: Source providers for rules (local files, catalog, git repos, URLs)

path.description: Local file path (required for type: local)

url.description: Remote URL (required for type: git or url)

ref.description: Git branch, tag, or commit SHA (for type: git, defaults to 'main')

check_interval.description: Override global check interval for this git source (seconds). Branches default to 24h, tags to 7 days, commits never check.

id.description: Catalog align ID (required for type: catalog)

include.description: Multiple git source URLs with integrated ref and path (e.g., https://github.com/org/repo@v2.0.0/aligns). Each URL is fully qualified and parsed for host, org, repo, ref, and path.

oneOf.description: List of exporter adapters to generate (e.g., 'cursor', 'agents')
Exporter adapters with optional format configuration

format.description: Export format: native (multi-file or agent-specific format), agents-md (universal AGENTS.md)

scopes.description: Hierarchical scopes for monorepo path-based rule application

include.description: Glob patterns to include within this scope

exclude.description: Glob patterns to exclude from this scope

rulesets.description: Rule IDs or align references to apply in this scope

merge.description: Merge strategy configuration for multi-source rules

strategy.description: Merge strategy: deep (property-level merge by rule ID)

max_file_size_mb.description: Maximum file size in MB for source files (default: 10MB)

max_directory_depth.description: Maximum directory depth for scanning (default: 10 levels)

export.description: Export behavior configuration for mode hints and token caps

mode_hints.description: Control how execution mode metadata is exported to non-Cursor formats

default.description: Default mode hints behavior: off (no markers), metadata_only (JSON markers only), hints (markers + visible intent), native (exporter-specific)

overrides.description: Per-exporter overrides for mode hints behavior

max_hint_blocks.description: Maximum number of rules to include mode hints for (default: 20)

max_hint_tokens.description: Maximum token budget for mode hints across all rules (default: 1600)

backup.description: Backup and restore configuration. Backups are mandatory before destructive operations.

keep_count.description: Number of backups to keep (older backups auto-deleted, default: 20)

detection.description: Agent detection configuration for automatic discovery during sync

auto_enable.description: Auto-enable detected agents without prompting (default: false)

ignored_agents.description: Agents to never prompt about during detection

overlays.description: Overlay configuration for declarative customization of upstream rules (Overlays system)

overrides.description: List of overlay definitions to apply to upstream rules

selector.description: Deterministic selector targeting exactly one rule (e.g., 'rule[id=...]')

set.description: Key-value pairs to set (supports nested paths with dot notation)

remove.description: List of keys to remove (supports nested paths with dot notation)

max_operations_per_override.description: Maximum combined set+remove operations per override (default: 20)

plugs.description: Plug fills for template slots in rules

fills.description: Slot fills (key: slot name, value: fill value)

approval.description: Approval workflow configuration for team mode

internal.description: Approval mode for internal team repository changes

external.description: Approval mode for external dependency sources

servers.description: Array of MCP server configurations for AI agents

name.description: Unique identifier for the MCP server (e.g., 'aligntrue')

command.description: Command to execute the MCP server (e.g., 'npx', 'python', 'node')

args.description: Arguments to pass to the command

disabled.description: Disable this server without removing configuration (default: false)
